description: Robyn O'Neil is dying of an extremely aggressive form of cancer accidentally introduced to humanity by the Utroms, the Utroms are working on a cure, but by the time they are finished Robyn will be dead. Leaving it up to the TMNT who are shrunk down to microscopic size to do battle with the cancer inside Robyn's body.
name: Heroes in a Half Cell
Summer Special

description:
DIY Danger:

The Spice Maidens:

Tails Flipside:
name: DIY Danger

description: "RECKONING", PART 1 OF 4. It's time. After years of waiting in the wings, Daken now moves towards his destiny of becoming the new Romulus. But to do so, he must combine forces with his father, Wolverine...who has a much different goal in mind. Will Daken finally get what he's wanted his entire life? Or will he finally get what he deserves?
name: Reckoning, Part 1

description:
No Future: Sonic traveled in the future

Channel hoppers: Tails stops subliminal messages coming from Robotnik's appretion gang

Raining Bananas: Sonic must save the Mobians from being flooded with bananas

Spaced out part 2:
name: No Future

description:
The Detour: Sonic and Tails explored an unknown area

Fall of the Leaf: as Tails patrols El Darado Zone a rich

Spaced out: Amy, Techo and Shortfuse are in a middle of alien invaders warzone
name: The Detour
Crisis In The Chemical Plant Zone
Crisis In The Chemical Plant Zone: Part 2
Cip & Ciop e l'insopportabile Sir Nut

description: Like father like long-lost psychotic son? Not quite! Looks like this anticipated Father-Son reunion will result in bullets instead of tears! Will the Avengers get there in time tokeep Captain America and Red Skull from blowing themselves away and the world in the process? Hold on to your masks! The wildly entertaining team-up of MARK MILLAR (ULTIMATES) and CARLOS PACHECO (AVENGERS FOREVER) bring you the exhilarating conclusion of ULTIMATE COMICS AVENGERS: THE NEXT GENERATION!
name: The Next Generation, Conclusion

description: The Fantastic Four join in as the fires of DoomWar escalate into a fulll-blown inferno! Sometimes you can win every battle and still lose the war. That's the hard truth facing the Black Panther and the X-Men as they reel from Doctor Doom's most crippling blow yet. Doom now has everything he requires to become the most powerful force on Earth. All he needs is the time to bring his newly invincible armies into the field. The clock is ticking and Doomsday is coming.
name: Doomwar, Part 3

description: After the thrilling opening adventures of the all-new, all-different Queen Sonja, Dynamite proudly presents the next chapter! Featuring the Dynamite debut of writer Arvid (Kull) Nelson and artist Jackson (Avengers/Invaders) Herbert, Sonja finds herself warily upon the throne and facing a new and deadly threat from within... and without! Featuring a trio of incredible covers: Mel Rubi, Jackson Herbert and Lucio Parillo!
name: The Red Queen, Episode 1 of 5
Sun Trap

description: Just in time for FREE COMIC BOOK DAY 2010, Image Comics is re-presenting 10 first issues as an introduction to of the publisher's most acclaimed titles, with each acting as the perfect primer to their ongoing series and collected editions!
Image Comics is re-presenting 10 first issues as an introduction to of the publisher's most acclaimed titles, with each acting as the perfect primer to their ongoing series and collected editions!

Ellis and Wolfer continue Volume Three "The Last King Of England": no-one's comfortable with the king of the magicians being a British soldier who really just wants to be left alone with a bit of extra beer money in his pocket. Now, the forces of the establishment begin to surround the problem of William Gravel, in "A Very British Coup." It's never a dull day being Combat Magician William Gravel. This issue is available with a regular or wraparound cover by Mike Wolfer.
name: A Very British Coup

description: The Birds of Prey are sent on a mission to Russia and they run into the Secret Six. Both teams are vying for control of a Rocket Red suit. It is unknown to all except for Katarina that they are actually on a rescue mission for what is inside the Rocket Red suit - Ice! As Katarina slowly seizes control of the operation from Oracle, her college rival, the Birds become more and more angry. The issue ends with a knock-down drag-out fight between Oracle and Spy-Smasher!
name: Dead of Winter

volume.name: Birds of Prey: Dead of Winter

description: Introducing Feral Sewer Mimes - or FSM's as they are known to conspiracy theorists everywhere! When the Tick breaks Arthur's toilet and there is no money for repairs, The Tick decides to do it himself. The results so disastrous that The Tick and Arthur actually end up in the sewers underneath The City where instead of the mythical sewer alligators they encounter a band of feral sewer mimes!
name: Toilet Humor

description: Stiles and his crew are going Tiger-hunting, which is all very well so long as your intended prey has no idea you're coming. But the last days of the Third Reich prove to be a savage time, and as British and Waffen SS tanks stalk each other through the wretched gloom of the German winter, tragedy is never far away.
name: The Firefly And His Majesty, Part Two: Soldiers Of The Reich

description:
MAPPO agents are loose in Los Angeles. Information Agents Hip Flask and Ebony Hide must work with the LAPD to track them down and route out the sleeper cell controlling them. But who is Blackthorne?

Richard Starkings' ELEPHANTMEN turns 25 (issues, that is) in style! Each page of the issue is drawn by a profoundly talented guest artist, representing some of the best talent in comics.

ELEPHANTMEN #25 chronicles the history of the Elephantmen from one man's point of view, making it a great jumping-on point for new readers!
name: The Big Picture

description: The fan-favorite series DV8 returns with the eight-part "Gods & Monsters" arc written by critically acclaimed writer Brian Wood (DEMO, DMZ, NORTHLANDERS) with art by up-and-comer Rebekah Isaacs (Drafted). In their short history, the mismatched band of superpowered losers, freaks and masochists of DV8 have seen a lot and done even more, but it's nothing compared to this. As Gem Antonelli (a.k.a. Copycat) is debriefed in a holding cell, the story of how eight troubled teenagers were briefly gods to a prehistorical world unfolds against the backdrop of a cataclysmic disaster. "The Day I Tried To Live" is part one in this amazing and tragic story unlike anything set in the WildStorm Universe before.
name: The Day I Tried To Live

description: Three words: BLACK! ADAM! JUNIOR! Two more words: FREDDY! FREEMAN?!? That can't be right, can it? Billy and Mary are in real trouble now... From the Eisner-winning writers of TINY TITANS and the artist of BLUE BEETLE!
name: Black Adam Junior?!?

volume.name: Billy Batson and the Magic of SHAZAM!

description: SECOND COMING, CHAPTER FOUR The X-Men chasing Cable and Hope have lost a teammate. They arent giving up, but the trail has gone cold. Thats where Rogue comes in. But how could she know where Hope and Cable are? And the battle between the New Mutants and Hodges forces ends here!
name: Second Coming, Chapter Four

description: In this collection of issues #24-36 of the Eisner Award-winning series, Yorick's unbalanced sister Hero tracks him to San Francisco, only to find that he has seemingly succumbed to the male-killing plague.
name: Book Three

volume.name: Y: The Last Man - The Deluxe Edition

description: In the latest SMT collection, featuring issues #45-52, Wesley Dodds encounters a brash young pilot called Blackhawk and enters the seedy world of pulp publishing.
name: The Blackhawk and The Return of the Scarlet

volume.name: Sandman Mystery Theatre: The Blackhawk and the Return of the Scarlet Ghost

description:
Strongbow's wolf faces a dog-pet who has become feral after contracting rabies. The wolf wins the fight but is infected with the disease. The story is a bizarre tale and the elves struggle to attempt to understand the psychology of a sick animal suffering from an unknown disease, that rather than weakening its host, simply makes it more ferocious.
During the take, Strongbow must briefly separate himself from his clan, which he also chose to do in ElfQuest #12. Strongbow himself contracts rabies "the howling disease", and the WolfRiders seek out a cure for both he and the wolf from Old Maggoty, a troll-witchdoctor.
name: WolfWood

description:
After ElfQuest: Kings of the Broken Wheel series, the Palace of The High-Ones has ceased to exist in its gargantuan form. Instead, only a miniature replica exists in Savah's house in Sorrow's End.
The renegade Kahvi has seduced Tyldak and this bat-elf escorts her wherever she wants to go. While travelling, she is assailed by one of her former Go-Backs tribemates who failed to recognise her. The elf is pinned down and speaks with Kahvi, eventually leading her back to her tribe, who asks to follow her once again. She leads them to Sun Villagers where she and Tyldak attempt to steal the miniature palace.
Kavhi rides a giant fandor, and Windkin rescues the miniature palace after Tyldak has flown off with it in its talons. Yun and Chot temporarily vye for its possession, but Kahvi reclaims the palace, while in midair flight falls off her bird and through Savah's roof. She refuses to apologise but Sun Village reclaims custody of the palace. She and Tyldak refuse to pledge loyalty, and are imprisoned in the Preservers sticky cocoon.
name: GOING BACK

description:
The complete archives are available if you visit http://www.elfquest.com/gallery/OnlineComics3.html.

This is the wonderful story of Little Patch, the human child who was rejected because of the mark on his face. He was put in the forest to die of exposure, but Tyleet found the babe and became its mother.
Patch was "giant" compared to the elves, growing to be tall by human standards. He learned to speak the language of the elves better than any other human on the world of two moons. His destiny became significant as the great hope of humanity to understand and make peace with the The High-Ones who became a part of their world.
This episode tells of his early years intimately associated with Tyleet.
name: LITTLE PATCH

description:
Hidden Years attempts to explain the total history of the #Wolfriders from the moment they landed on World of Two Moons (ElfQuest: Hidden Years #10 & ElfQuest: Hidden Years #9) to the point where Ember is fully grown and becomes chieftess (post ElfQuest: Kings of the Broken Wheel era).
This is a very crucial issue in terms of the total heritage because it shows Ember as a full grown woman, with independent vision for the way that the wolftribe should govern itself. Her fledging independence creates a clash with her chief and father, Cutter.
name: RIGHT OF PASSAGE

description:
Rayek makes his triumphant return to visit with Ekuar and the Wolfriders. His reputation is not good, and Strongbow freezes him dead in his tracks, until a council can be called to speak with Rayek.
Meanwhile the humans with leisure-tools are prospering, and this means growing farther into the dwelling place of the hidden grove of Redlance. The elves' peace becomes interrupted with the realization that soon the humans will build a road directly through the territory of the elves.
The humans reach the point of world history where they are finally more and dominant over all elves, whether the elves remain on world of two moons or not.
name: SHARDS PART TWO

description:
There is an all-on seige from the flocks of mutated wild species on the world of two moons. These are Winnowill's beast-children who have been adducing her arcane dark powers and becoming more vicious, and monstrous. They are zombified under the mental direction and eventually find the new Holt. The tribe fights off the animals valiantly, but can only withstand and defeat the ones who attempt to reach their den.

Teir becomes an exile who is despised by the Wolfriders. Ember resolves as chief that she must follow and track him.

Meanwhile Skywise, no longer needed to be Ember's advisor, runs off on his wolf to find Aroree, his lover who split with Cutter's task force in the mini-series ElfQuest: Shards, near #12 along that timeline.
name: Questions-No Answers

description: Tyleet is pregnant with her recognised partner Scouter's child. She foretells of the babe's divine destiny.
name: To Shed a Teir (sic)

description: Leetah witnesses all the mind-bending that Winnowill had done to Teir. She resolves to finally challenge the alpha-beast that had been mutated under Winnowill's spell. This beast of godzilla-proportion had antlers, fangs, claws, and a goatish demure. Leetah pierces its mind through the side of its brain, and for the first time, uses her powers of healing to kill.
name: Siege at Howling Rock

description:
The Timeline of this release is concurrent with ElfQuest: Shards # 16. Teir receives the ultimate-soul imprint of Winnowill, and asked Leetah for a total cleansing.

Then the Palace of the The High-Ones materialises, and Ember leaves with the rest of the Wolfriders. She begs Teir to join her but Teir stays on the world of two moons. Ember reunites with Mender, fresh from a triumphant battle against Two-Edge and the citadel village of Grohmul Djun.

Meanwhiles, in this issue, Cutter reunites with Leetah, and Pike adopts Krim and the custody of Skot's child.

The issue ends when the entire family of elves flies off in the Palace of the High ones without Teir.

When a series of crimes involving child abuse shocks the citizens of Gotham City, Batman and Commissioner Gordon embark on a quest to find the immoral perpetrator. But when Batman is accused of being the enraged killer of the child abuser, it is up to a young battered girl to come forth and clear his name. Treating this issue with the true severity that it demands, this book also includes a subplot in which Commissioner Gordon must come to terms with the abuse of his past and break its vicious cycle.

Set during Batman's early years along with a newly appointed commissioner Gordon, the subplot details the breakdown of Gordon's first marriage.
name: Batman: Night Cries

description: "SOMETHING CAN STOP THE JUGGERNAUT, PART 2" The Juggernaut lies helpless before a mysterious Cosmic Avatar who is determined to kill him -- and the only thing standing between them is Spider-Man. If Our Hero wants to prevent further mayhem, he has to try reasoning with an angry being who can squash him like a bug and he has to survive a high-speed chase from one end of Manhattan to the other. Roger Stern and Lee Weeks bring you the second sensational installment of the Spider-Man/Juggernaut Trilogy -- a story the Cosmic Avatar insisted that we call "Vengeance is Mine!"
name: Vengeance is Mine
O Rei Dos Disfarces
